casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS AND ADMINISTRATIVE ACTIONS

January 16, 2007

[Cite as 01/16/2006 Case Announcements, 2007-0hio-107.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2006-1366. State v. Short.

Montgomery C.P. No. 2004CR02635. This cause is pending before the court as a death penalty appeal from the Court of Common Pleas of Montgomery County. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for stay of execution pending appeal,

It is ordered by the court that the motion is granted.
